titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the setling and encrease of the manufacture of pins in this realme
Proclamations. 1618-07-22
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, deputie printers for the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Basing the two and twentith day of Iuly, in the sixteenth yeere of our reigne ..
In this edition the last complete line of the text ends: six-.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
